posts.content:
You want to drive on Fuchs this season, well this is your chance!

Selling my complete Porsche Brake Stuff including Wheels.
So, this is what you get,
944 Brake
944 Brake Adapter
5.5x15 Polished Fake Fuchs, V-Detailed
6x15 Polished Fake Fuchs, V-Detialed
(V-Detailing, can be remoded, if disliked, its just a sticker)
Wheels are the good TÜV versions, not the cheap ones
Chrome Wheelnuts
ISP polished Caps with Porsche logo
Rear Beetle Drum with studs
Chrome Valve caps
10mm spacer for the rear, to get the caps on correct
New drilled and with lugs Brakediscs
New Wheel bearing and seals for wheel hub
Everything is brand new, just the brake caliper need new color and mabye new seals




Price for all that is 1800Euro - TIRES NOT INCLUDED!

You don´t need to worry if something missing, its just bolt on!

Everything is located in Germany. Shipping, no Problem.

e-mail: johnny_danger@gmx.net

Thanks for watching.

Ben
